PlaceBid(bytes32).details: the bid should be placed before the end of the bidding period

params.HashValue: have the hash value of the bid being placed
has the hash value of the bid placed

RevealBid(uint256,uint256).details: reveal the bids in the duration of the revealing period

params.BidAmount: has the value of the amount bidded

RevealBidInVickreyAuction(uint256,uint25.details: compare bid to the previous and highest and second highest and change them accordingly

RevealingTimeRemaining().details: check the time is valid to reveal bids(it's in revealind duration)

params.amount: has the value of ether that is going to be transferred
params.receiver: has the address of the person that receive the amount paid
